entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 12:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

Humidity: 95 %

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon then becoming light later this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
